job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongAt Zillow Group we believe that home matters and we are on a mission to help everyone get into a home where they can thrive The process of buying selling or renting a home should be easybrbrThe NLP Applications and Experiences Team is building nextgeneration AI algorithms and platforms to transform the way real estate works by reducing friction in the home buying selling and renting process These algorithms and platforms ingest large volumes of data and process it to build and deploy production models at scale that improve the home buyingselling and renting experience Our team handles machine learning tasks across the multiple business lines including Premier Agent Shopping Rentals and Zillow Offers absorbing significant amounts of data and building ML and deep learning models to drive transactions and revenuebrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongWe are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to operate in a novel space and craft the next generation of NLP solutions that will lead our vision In this role you will be encouraged to think creatively and challenge established assumptions and expectations not by building on what we already have but coming up with new insights that fuel innovation You will build models and insights from data to guide the future of Zillows businesses and develop highly engaging user experiencesbrbrThis role has been categorized as a Remote position Remote employees do not have a permanent corporate office workplace and instead work from a physical location of their choice which must be identified to the Company Employees may live in any of the 50 US States with limited exceptions In certain cases an employee in a remotedesignated job may need to live in a specific region or time zone to support customers or clients as part of their rolebrbrIn Colorado the standard pay range for this role is 13240000  21160000 Annually This range is specific to Colorado and may not be applicable to other locationsbrbrWho you arebrbrstronguThis Is a New Fast Growing Space And We Are Looking For Someone Who HasbrbrustrongAs a Machine Learning Engineer you are a rollupthesleeves and get it done practitioner in machine learning or natural language processingbrulli3 years in building machine learning application and engineeringliliProficient with an object oriented language like Java Python Go C or CliliGood understanding of common families of models including deep learning transfer learning and transformer NLP models on big data resourcesliliExperience in one or more machine learning frameworks like PyTorch ScikitLearn or TensorFlowliliHave trained launched and debugged models in productionliliExperience supporting and collaborating with scientists engineers and PMsliliExcellent communication skills and ability to handle ambiguity and learn quicklybrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliExperience in big data technology like Apache Spark and HiveliliExperience with Pandas and NotebookliliExperience with AWS Azure or GCPbrliulIn addition to a competitive base salary this position is also eligible for equity awards based on factors such as experience performance and locationbrbrGet to know usbrbrZillow is reimagining real estate to make it easier to unlock lifes next chapterbrbrAs the mostvisited real estate website in the United States Zillow and its affiliates offer customers an ondemand experience for selling buying renting or financing with transparency and nearly seamless endtoend service Millions of people visit Zillow and its affiliate sites every month to start their home search and now they can rely on Zillow to help them finish it  and no matter what job youre in you will play a critical role in making this vision a realitybrbrAt Zillow were powered by our innovative and inclusive work culture where everyone has the flexibility support and resources to do the best work of their careers Our efforts to streamline the real estate transaction is supported by our passion to redefine the employee experience a deeprooted culture of innovation a fundamental commitment to Equity and Belonging and uworldclass benefitsu But dont just take our word for it Read our reviews on uGlassdooru and recent recognition from multiple organizations including uFortunes 100 Best Companies to Work For List 2021u Bloomberg GenderEquality Index 2021 Human Rights Campaign HRC Corporate Equity Index and HRCs Best Place to Work for LGBTQ Equality 2021 Fortune Best Workplaces for Technology 2020 Fortune Best Workplaces for Millennials 2020 Fortune Best Workplaces for Parents 2020 and the Deloitte Technology Fast 500brbremZillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive innovative environment with the best employees We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability gender identity or Veteran status If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation please contact us at RecruitingAccessibilityzillowgroupcombrbrememApplicants who
